Articles.Content: Help I need help with cam controlso I'll be in the cockpit with 2+ kerbal space and i cant get out of thengine screen

Um. I don't have Xbone -- so I'm just going by the little that I know. There's supposed to be a question mark that you can click which gives you a control map. Look for the camera control called "Toggle Flight Control Mode". I think that's the correct one.
